name: AtomStack Cambrian Base Printer
pre_gcode: G1 Z2.0 F3000 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X0.1 Y20 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move to start position
G1 X0.1 Y200.0 Z0.3 F1500.0 E15 ; Draw the first line
G1 X0.9 Y200.0 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move to side a little
G1 X0.9 Y20 Z0.3 F1500.0 E30 ; Draw the second line
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ; Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X5 Y20 Z0.3 F5000.0 ; Move over to prevent blob squish
post_gcode: G1 E-8 Z0.2 F2400 ;Retract and raise Z
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
